I. CITY MANAGER'S AGENDA
1. Transmitting Communication from Louis A. DePasquale, City Manager, relative to the the transfer of
$1,034,387 in the General Fund between School Department statutory accounts as follows:
$1,034,387 from the Salary and Wages account to the School Other Ordinary Maintenance account
$1,011,006 and to the School Travel and Training Account $23,381 which are used for school
improvement and professional development plans for all schools; school and department operating
transfers to expedite purchases; expenses for special education student transportation, which are
greater than anticipated; and to cover the cost of air quality testing and mold remediation at 4 schools.
CMA 2019 #13
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Devereux, Councillor Kelley, Councillor Mallon,
Mayor McGovern, Councillor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toomey,
Councillor Zondervan

2. Transmitting Communication from Louis A. DePasquale, City Manager, relative to the appropriation
of the U.S Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) Cooperative Agreement grants
received in the amount of $28,334 to the Grant Fund Human Rights Commission Salary and Wages
account ($19,534) and to the Travel & Training Account ($8,800), which will be used for case
processing of dual-filed housing discrimination complaints, administrative costs and staff training.
CMA 2019 #14
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Devereux, Councillor Kelley, Councillor Mallon,
Mayor McGovern, Councillor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toomey,
Councillor Zondervan

3. Transmitting Communication from Louis A. DePasquale, City Manager, relative to the appropriation
of $175,000 from Free Cash to the Public Investment Fund Public Works Department Extraordinary
Expenditures account to fund a Climate Change Resilience Analysis which will focus on zoning
recommendations.
CMA 2019 #15
RESULT:
ORDER ADOPTED [9-0-0]

YEAS:
Councillor Carlone, Vice Mayor Devereux, Councillor Kelley, Councillor Mallon,
Mayor McGovern, Councillor Siddiqui, Councillor Simmons, Councillor Toomey,
Councillor Zondervan
